home.growth_info: Check how much our platform has grown last year.
home.newsletter_info: Follow on updates to news on the platform.
home.time: It's {time}, {day}, what will we do today?

news.news_1_subtitle: You can create bots with artificial inteligence and integrate them to your communication systems.
news.news_2_subtitle: In Flows you can create bots, manage conversation flows and set your custom contact settngs.
news.news_3_subtitle: Improve your bots in Artificial Inteligence and leave them ready to manage situations that would normally require human input.
news.news_4_subtitle: Interact with your clients or users in Agents with greater control with all your chats in one place.

account.profile_text: You can change your personal information, such as profile picture and username, or delete your account.
account.reset_confirm: Do you really wish to remove your profile picture? You can send another later.
account.delete_account_confirm: Do you really wish to delete your account? Any flows, intelligences and access to omnichannel will be lost and unrecoverable.
account.save_confirm: Do you wish to commit these changes?
account.password_confirm: Confirm this action entering your password

orgs.orgs_description: To the side are the organizations in which you are a member. Choose one or create a new one to access the platform.
orgs.delete_confirm: Do you really wish to delete organization “{org}”? All your data such as flows, artificial inteligence and access to agent channels will be lost and unsalvageable.
